name: Toddlers Break Things
description:
TODDLERS BREAK THINGS is a fun way to live as a toddler while the babysitter goes outside for a cigarette. You have three minutes to do what you please but be strategic and don't get too rowdy or your spree ends!  Don't forget to play with fire.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD + Mouse Move/Look E Pickup/Drop SPACE Throw/Hold to charge SHIFT Run

TEAM:

Programming and Art : Experial83 Composition and Sound Design : Sennoide Game Design : Vijay Kumar Art Support : SpellMender

Thanks for playing!

This project was created in a little over a week with the intention for submitting to a game jam. While the submission never came to fruition, the project did so we hope you enjoy the fruits of our labour. Much love.
